title: EnsemblGenomes
text: EnsemblGenomes scrapes [ensembl.org] [ensemblgenomes.org] FTP servers locate genome reference fasta files genome annotation gff3 files provided species supported Ensembl. July 2024, corresponds 300 vertebrate, 300 metazoa, 200 protists, 150 plants, 1,000 fungi 30,000 bacteria species. Rather supporting BiocFileCache, EnsemblGenomes simply intends retrieve list URL fasta gff3 files across Ensembl releases plain data frame.

title: EnsemblGenomes
text: EnsemblGenomes package can installed Bioconductor using following command:

title: EnsemblGenomes
text: Four functions available: list_ensembl_files() list_ensembl_species() list_ensembl_taxa() list_ensembl_releases()
code: library(EnsemblGenomes)  list_ensembl_taxa() #> # A tibble: 6 × 2 #>   taxon      url                                                #>   <chr>      <chr>                                              #> 1 vertebrate https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/                       #> 2 metazoa    https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/metazoa/  #> 3 protists   https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/protists/ #> 4 fungi      https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/fungi/    #> 5 plants     https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/plants/   #> 6 bacteria   https://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/ensemblgenomes/pub/bacteria/  list_ensembl_releases(taxon = 'vertebrate') #> # A tibble: 32 × 3 #>    release     date             url                                     #>    <chr>       <chr>            <chr>                                   #>  1 release-112 2024-06-20 11:33 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-112 #>  2 release-111 2024-06-11 16:17 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-111 #>  3 release-110 2024-01-25 09:34 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-110 #>  4 release-109 2023-03-02 09:36 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-109 #>  5 release-108 2022-10-10 12:59 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-108 #>  6 release-107 2022-10-24 14:15 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-107 #>  7 release-106 2022-08-30 11:58 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-106 #>  8 release-105 2022-02-11 18:12 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-105 #>  9 release-104 2021-03-30 13:08 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-104 #> 10 release-103 2021-02-16 17:52 https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-103 #> # ℹ 22 more rows  list_ensembl_species('vertebrate', release = 'release-100') #> # A tibble: 286 × 6 #>    species                          url           taxon collection release date  #>    <chr>                            <glue>        <chr> <lgl>      <chr>   <chr> #>  1 acanthochromis_polyacanthus      https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020… #>  2 accipiter_nisus                  https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020… #>  3 ailuropoda_melanoleuca           https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020… #>  4 amazona_collaria                 https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020… #>  5 amphilophus_citrinellus          https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020… #>  6 amphiprion_ocellaris             https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020… #>  7 amphiprion_percula               https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020… #>  8 anabas_testudineus               https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020… #>  9 anas_platyrhynchos               https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020… #> 10 anas_platyrhynchos_platyrhynchos https://ense… vert… NA         releas… 2020… #> # ℹ 276 more rows  list_ensembl_files('amphiprion_percula', release = 'release-100') #> ℹ Scanning taxons [release-100]... #> ✔ Taxon found: vertebrate [release-100] #> # A tibble: 4 × 8 #>   date             release     taxon   collection species type  url   url_status #>   <chr>            <chr>       <chr>   <lgl>      <chr>   <chr> <chr>      <int> #> 1 2020-03-04 22:28 release-100 verteb… NA         amphip… refe… http…        200 #> 2 2020-03-04 22:28 release-100 verteb… NA         amphip… refe… http…        200 #> 3 2020-03-04 22:28 release-100 verteb… NA         amphip… refe… http…        200 #> 4 2020-03-16 00:31 release-100 verteb… NA         amphip… anno… http…        200

title: Authors and Citation
text: Serizay J (2024). EnsemblGenomes: Rapid access Ensembl-provided genome reference annotation files. R package version 0.99.0, https://github.com/js2264/EnsemblGenomes.
code: @Manual{,   title = {EnsemblGenomes: Rapid access to Ensembl-provided genome reference and annotation files},   author = {Jacques Serizay},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.99.0},   url = {https://github.com/js2264/EnsemblGenomes}, }

what: Rapid access to Ensembl-provided genome reference and annotation files
title: Rapid access to Ensembl-provided genome reference and annotation files
text: EnsemblGenomes scrapes ensembl.org ensemblgenomes.org FTP servers locate genome reference fasta files genome annotation gff3 files provided species supported Ensembl. July 2024, apprach gives access 300 vertebrate, 300 metazoa, 200 protists, 150 plants, 1,000 fungi 30,000 bacteria species. Rather supporting BiocFileCache-based file caching, EnsemblGenomes simply intends retrieve list URL fasta gff3 files across Ensembl releases plain data frame.

title: Rapid access to Ensembl-provided genome reference and annotation files
Rapid access to Ensembl-provided genome reference and annotation files
code: library(EnsemblGenomes)  list_ensembl_species('vertebrate') ##  # A tibble: 324 × 6 ##     species                          url                                                                            taxon      collection release     date         ##     <chr>                            <glue>                                                                         <chr>      <lgl>      <chr>       <chr>        ##   1 acanthochromis_polyacanthus      https://ensembl.org/acanthochromis_polyacanthus/Info/Annotation#genebuild      vertebrate NA         release-112 2024-04-23 … ##   2 accipiter_nisus                  https://ensembl.org/accipiter_nisus/Info/Annotation#genebuild                  vertebrate NA         release-112 2024-04-23 … ##   3 ailuropoda_melanoleuca           https://ensembl.org/ailuropoda_melanoleuca/Info/Annotation#genebuild           vertebrate NA         release-112 2024-04-23 … ##   4 amazona_collaria                 https://ensembl.org/amazona_collaria/Info/Annotation#genebuild                 vertebrate NA         release-112 2024-04-23 … ##   5 amphilophus_citrinellus          https://ensembl.org/amphilophus_citrinellus/Info/Annotation#genebuild          vertebrate NA         release-112 2024-04-23 … ##   6 amphiprion_ocellaris             https://ensembl.org/amphiprion_ocellaris/Info/Annotation#genebuild             vertebrate NA         release-112 2024-04-23 … ##   7 amphiprion_percula               https://ensembl.org/amphiprion_percula/Info/Annotation#genebuild               vertebrate NA         release-112 2024-04-23 … ##   8 anabas_testudineus               https://ensembl.org/anabas_testudineus/Info/Annotation#genebuild               vertebrate NA         release-112 2024-04-23 … ##   9 anas_platyrhynchos               https://ensembl.org/anas_platyrhynchos/Info/Annotation#genebuild               vertebrate NA         release-112 2024-04-23 … ##  10 anas_platyrhynchos_platyrhynchos https://ensembl.org/anas_platyrhynchos_platyrhynchos/Info/Annotation#genebuild vertebrate NA         release-112 2024-04-23 … ##  # ℹ 314 more rows ##  # ℹ Use `print(n = ...)` to see more rows  list_ensembl_files('amphiprion_percula') ##  ℹ Scanning taxons... ##  ✔ Taxon found: vertebrate [release-112] ##  # A tibble: 4 × 8 ##    date             release     taxon      collection species            type        url                                                                url_status ##    <chr>            <chr>       <chr>      <lgl>      <chr>              <chr>       <chr>                                                                   <int> ##  1 2024-02-13 16:45 release-112 vertebrate NA         amphiprion_percula reference   https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-112/fasta//amphiprion_percula…        200 ##  2 2024-02-13 16:46 release-112 vertebrate NA         amphiprion_percula reference   https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-112/fasta//amphiprion_percula…        200 ##  3 2024-02-13 16:46 release-112 vertebrate NA         amphiprion_percula reference   https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-112/fasta//amphiprion_percula…        200 ##  4 2024-03-05 08:40 release-112 vertebrate NA         amphiprion_percula annotations https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-112/gff3//amphiprion_percula/…        200

title: Rapid access to Ensembl-provided genome reference and annotation files
text: Install littler EnsemblGenomes R Make symlinks r (littler) list_ensembl_files (EnsemblGenomes) Enjoy :)
code: Rscript -e 'install.packages("pak", repos = sprintf("https://r-lib.github.io/p/pak/stable/%s/%s/%s", .Platform$pkgType, R.Version()$os, R.Version()$arch))' Rscript -e 'pak::pkg_install("eddelbuettel/littler")' Rscript -e 'pak::pkg_install("js2264/EnsemblGenomes")' sudo ln -s `Rscript -e "cat(.libPaths()[1])"`/littler/bin/r /usr/local/bin/ sudo ln -s `Rscript -e "cat(.libPaths()[1])"`/EnsemblGenomes/bin/list_ensembl_files /usr/local/bin/ sudo ln -s `Rscript -e "cat(.libPaths()[1])"`/EnsemblGenomes/bin/list_ensembl_species /usr/local/bin/ list_ensembl_species fungi | head list_ensembl_files plasmodium_vivax

title: EnsemblGenomes — EnsemblGenomes
text: EnsemblGenomes provides access genome references annotations Ensembl

title: EnsemblGenomes — EnsemblGenomes
code: list_ensembl_taxa()  list_ensembl_releases(taxon)  list_ensembl_species(   taxon,   release = utils::head(list_ensembl_releases(taxon)$release, 1) )  list_ensembl_files(species, taxon = NULL, release = NULL)

title: EnsemblGenomes — EnsemblGenomes
text: taxon list_ensembl_taxa()$taxon release list_ensembl_releases(taxon)$release species list_ensembl_species(taxon, release)

title: EnsemblGenomes — EnsemblGenomes
text: tibble listing available taxa, Ensembl releases supported species.

title: EnsemblGenomes — EnsemblGenomes
text: Jul. 2025, around: vertebrate: ~ 325 species [release-112] metazoa: ~ 335 species [release-59] protists: ~ 237 species [release-59] fungi: ~ 1502 species [release-59] plants: ~ 153 species [release-59] bacteria: ~ 31332 species [release-59]
